content: पर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पॄ-भावे अप्, कर्तरि अच्-वा] (Declined optionally like a pronoun in <ab>nom.</ab> and voc. <ab>pl.</ab>, and <ab>abl.</ab> and <ab>loc.</ab> <ab>sing.</ab> when it denotes relative position) {@--1@} Other, different, another; see पर {%<ab>m.</ab>%} also. {@--2@} Distant, removed, remote. {@--3@} Beyond, further, on the other side of; म्लेच्छदेशस्ततः परः <ls>Ms. 2. 23</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">7. 158.</ls> {@--4@} Subsequent, following, next to, future, after, (usually with <ab>abl.</ab>); बाल्यात्परामिव दर्शा मदनोऽध्युवास <ls>R. 5. 63</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 31.</ls> {@--5@} Higher, superior; सिकतात्वादपि परां प्रपेदे परमाणुतां <ls>R. 15. 22</ls>; इंद्रियाणि पराण्याहुरिंद्रियेभ्यः परं मनः . मनसस्तु परा बुद्धिर्यो बुद्धेः परतस्तु सः .. <ls>Bg. 3. 42.</ls> {@--6@} Highest, greatest, most distinguished, pre-eminent, chief, best, principal, न त्वया द्रष्ठव्यानां परं दृष्टं <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; <ls>Ki. 5. 18</ls>; परतोऽपि परः <ls>Ku. 2. 14</ls> ‘higher than the highest’; <ls n="Ku.">6. 19</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7. 27.</ls> {@--7@} Having as a following letter or sound, followed by (in <ab>comp.</ab>) {@--8@} Alien, estranged, stranger. {@--9@} Hostile, inimical, adverse. {@--10@} Exceeding, having a surplus or remainder, left over; as in परं शतं ‘exceeding or more than a hundred.’ {@--11@} Final, last. {@--12@} (At the end of comp) Having anything as the highest object, absorbed or engrossed in, intent on, solely devoted to, wholly engaged or occupied in; परिचर्यापरः <ls>R. 1. 91</ls>; so ध्यानपर, शोकपर, दैवपर, चिंतापर &c. --रः {@--1@} Another person, a stranger, foreigner; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>pl.</ab> in this sense; यतः परेषां गुणग्रहीतासि <ls>Bv. 1. 9</ls>; <ls>Śi. 20. 74</ls>; see एक, अन्य also. {@--2@} A foe, an enemy, adversary; उत्तिष्ठमानस्तु परो नोपेक्ष्यः पथ्यमिच्छता <ls>Śi. 2. 10</ls>; <ls>Pt. 2. 158</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 21.</ls> --रं {@--1@} The highest point or pitch, culminating point. {@--2@} The Supreme spirit. {@--3@} Final beatitude. {@--4@} The secondary meaning of a word. {@--5@} (In logic.) One of the two kinds of सामान्य or generality of notion; more extensive kind, (comprehending more objects); {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} पृथ्वी is पर with respect to a घट. {%Note%}--The <ab>acc.</ab>, <ab>instr.</ab> and <ab>loc.</ab> singulars of पर are used adverbially; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} ({%a%}) परं {1} beyond, over, out of (with <ab>abl.</ab>); वर्त्मनः परं <ls>R. 1. 17.</ls> {2} after (with <ab>abl.</ab>); अस्मात्परं <ls>Ś. 6. 24</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 66</ls>; <ls n="R.">3. 39</ls>; <ls>Me. 100</ls>; भाग्यायत्तमतः परं <ls>Ś. 4. 16</ls>; ततः परं &c. {3} thereupon, thereafter. {4} but, however. {5} otherwise. {6} in a high degree, excessively, very much, completely, quite; परं दुःखितोऽस्मि &c. {7} most willingly. {8} only. {9} at the utmost. ({%b%}) परेण {1} farther, beyond, more than; किं वा मृत्योः परेण विधास्यति <ls>Māl. 2. 2.</ls> {2} afterwards; मयि तु कृतनिधाने किं विदध्याः परेण <ls>Mv. 2. 49.</ls> {3} after (with <ab>abl.</ab>) स्तन्यत्यागात्परेण <ls>U. 2</ls>, <ls n="U.">7.</ls> ({%c%}) परे {1} afterwards, thereupon; अथ तेन दशाहतः परे <ls>R. 8. 73.</ls> {2} in future.
